text: Andre Murray (born September 30, 1987) is an American professional basketball player for San-en NeoPhoenix in Japan. Murray is a graduate of Portland State University. ==References== ==External links== *Stats in Japan Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:American expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:American men's basketball players Category:Bambitious Nara players Category:Basketball players from California Category:College of the Canyons alumni Category:Gunma Crane Thunders players Category:Hiroshima Lightning players Category:Junior college men's basketball players in the United States Category:Kanazawa Samuraiz players Category:Portland State Vikings men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Tokio Marine Nichido Big Blue players Category:Tokyo Cinq Rêves players Category:Guards (basketball)
title: Andre Murray
